title: import error when runing pytorch without cuda
body_html:
I download the the cpu version through
'conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch'
when I run 'import torch'
it comes:
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/XXX/.PyCharmCE2017.1/config/scratches/scratch.py", line 1, in
import torch
File "/home/XXX/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 56, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: libcudart.so.8.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

libcudart.so.8.0 is a cuda file, but I select the no cuda version,why it still need it.

can I run torch without cuda?
